attributes.action: Close all schools during 2nd Lockdown except for Key-workers children.
attributes.additional_details: Schools need to be closed during 2nd Lockdown as cases for Covid-19 started to escalate after children returned to school in September, so to reduce the number of cases of Covid-19 cases and deaths the sensible thing to do would be to shut down the schools for the 2nd lockdown except for key-workers children.
attributes.background: Close all schools during 2nd Lockdown except for Key-workers children. This will help reduce the number of Covid-19 cases more effectively than leaving them open.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557012
